resources.string:
CREATE TABLE attributes ( _id integer primary key autoincrement, name string not null,
base_str integer not null, base_con integer not null, base_siz integer not null, base_dex integer not null, base_app integer not null, base_int integer not null, base_pow integer not null, base_edu integer not null,
mod_str integer not null, mod_con integer not null, mod_siz integer not null, mod_dex integer not null, mod_app integer not null, mod_int integer not null, mod_pow integer not null, mod_edu integer not null,
age integer not null );
